snippet: At 25, Alex Sharp is preparing for his Broadway debut, playing a 15-year-old mathematician in “The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-Time.”
abstract: Snapshot interview with actor Alex Sharp, who is preparing for Broadway debut in The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-Time at Ethel Barrymore Theater.
lead_paragraph: At 25, Alex Sharp is preparing for his Broadway debut, playing a 15-year-old mathematician in “The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-Time.”
